entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
